name: Mole Invaders
description:
This is a game made for the Island Jam IV

Get a friend to play in this territory control game!

As one of the moles you have to drill through the ground, claiming it as your own.
Get the super drill power up to gain the ability to invade your enemy's territory!
The mole that conquered more ground when the time is over wins.
Be warned, it's easy to get trapped if you don't plan your moves in advance!

-------------{ CONTROLS }------------

Player 1 : [ w, a, s, d ]

player 2 : Arrow keys

--------------{ CREDITS }---------------

Art : Eduardo Martínez

Sound :  Ancor Amador

Code : Giovanni Bodega , Ismael Bolaños
